item.title: Blood, sweat and tears: Look back at the highs and lows of Hulk Hogan
item.description: The all-American hero of wrestling also had a Hollywood career and was one of Donald Trump's biggest fans.

item.title: Zelensky backtracks on law over anti-corruption bodies after protests
item.description: The legislation sparked the largest anti-government protests since the start of the war.

item.title: 'I can barely do one story. I just feel dizzy' - BBC's Gaza freelance journalists tell of struggle for food
item.description: Three freelance journalists working for the BBC in Gaza are facing the same dire circumstances as those they are covering.

item.title: One in five children in Gaza is malnourished, UN aid agency says
item.description: The UN agency for Palestinians says it has thousands of truckloads of supplies near Gaza which it wants to deliver.

item.title: Justice department official to meet Epstein accomplice Maxwell
item.description: The meeting comes as pressure grows on the Trump administration to release files linked to the disgraced financier's sex trafficking network.
